description.value:
Stone of Scorn
Punishment Rite (Level 3) • Caern

Time: 1 hour
Cost: 5 Gnosis
Target: One creature

Description

The Stone of Scorn marks a transgressor with spiritual disgrace. Though invisible to mundane senses, the mark is unmistakable to spirits and Garou alike.

Effect

If the target fails their saving throw, they are marked by scorn for three Caern Turns.

While marked:

  • Other Garou have disadvantage on Help actions used to aid the target
  • Minor spirits refuse assistance or guidance
  • The mark is visible to spiritual perception

The mark has no physical manifestation and causes no damage.

Ending the Rite

The Rite ends early if the target:

  • Performs a Rite of Cleansing, or
  • Completes a meaningful act of atonement acknowledged by the spirits

Resisting a Punishment Rite

If this rite targets an unwilling creature, the target may attempt to resist. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. Save DC = 8 + the performing Garou's Max Gnosis Rating. On a success, the Rite fails and has no effect (the Gnosis cost is still spent). On a failure, the Rite takes full effect. Willing targets do not make a saving throw.
